sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Col, Row, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import './BadgeEditForm.css' const BadgeEditForm = () => { const [selectedSport, setSelectedSport] = useState() const [selectedSkill, setSelectedSkill] = useState() const handleSportSelection = (e) => { setSelectedSport(e.target.innerText) } const handleSkillSelection = (e) => { setSelectedSkill(e.target.innerText) } return ( {!selectedSport && <>
Choose the sport badge you want to edit
Tennis
Football
Table Tennis
Jogging
Cycling
Paintball
Air-Soft
Skiing
Basketball
Workout
Volleyball
Badminton
Ice Skating
Bowling
Laser Tag
}
{ selectedSport && <>
{selectedSport}
{!selectedSkill && <>
Choose your skill level:
Recreational
Beginner
Intermediate
Advanced
} {selectedSkill && <>
Skill level: {selectedSkill}
} }
) } export default BadgeEditForm;
